description: Have Internet access on mobile phone
notes: W4 only. Binary 1=yes 2=no with 0=no cell phone
W4-W6. 8-point scale 1=several hours daily to 8=never. HIGHER=LESS. Consistent directionality across waves
W4-W5. Binary 1=yes 2=no. W6 asks about specific platforms (q51a-q51h) instead

description: How often use internet/social media to find political information
notes: W4 only. 6-point scale 1=everyday to 6=practically never. HIGHER=LESS

description: How often use internet/social media to express political opinion
notes: Different measurement across waves. W4 (6-point frequency 1=everyday to 6=never). W5-W6 (binary ever done). Not directly comparable - harmonization difficult

description: Use social media to express opinion on political issues
notes: W5-W6 only but different scales. W5 binary usage. W6 frequency scale. Requires careful harmonization

description: Use social media to connect with other people
notes: W5-W6 only but different scales. W5 binary usage. W6 frequency scale. Not directly comparable

description: Use social media to share news or information
notes: W5-W6 only but different scales. W5 binary usage. W6 frequency scale. Not directly comparable
